amendment.description: To set aside Marine Corps procurement funds for use for the procurement of nitrile rubber collapsible storage units.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1234 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1234 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S9366; text: CR S9366) To set aside Marine Corps procurement funds for use for the procurement of nitrile rubber collapsible storage units.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1234 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1234 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott.
